notes: Does not interrupt the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Allows the user to pass through other units, including wards, but not through buildings.
Checks the user's range type periodically and updates the speed bonus immediately if the range type changes.
When used constantly, increases the user's average movement speed by 7.5% if melee, and by 4.875% if ranged.
If used by a melee hero, increases the user's base turn rate to 1 for its duration. Turn rate slowing effects still affect it normally.
abilities.name: Phase
abilities.description: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 13% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

description: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
attrs: Bonus +5 Armor +25 Attack speed +15% Movement speed
info: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
